## This is useful startup plugins for VSCode development using 

- [codestream.codestream](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=codestream.codestream)
- [eamodio.gitlens](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=eamodio.gitlens)
- [mhutchie.git-graph](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=mhutchie.git-graph)
- [waderyan.gitblame](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=waderyan.gitblame)
- [huizhou.githd](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=huizhou.githd)
- [donjayamanne.githistory](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=donjayamanne.githistory)
